mission: To create open-source tools and experiences that empower Minecraft players and developers through collaboration and innovation.

values.title: Community First
values.description: We build with and for the community.

values.title: Open Source
values.description: Our projects are free and open for collaboration.

values.title: Design Driven
values.description: We care deeply about user experience and simplicity.

values.title: Quality
values.description: Stable, performant, and reliable by default.

principles.title: Transparency
principles.description: We work in the open, with nothing hidden from contributors.

principles.title: Collaboration
principles.description: Everyone is welcome to contribute ideas, feedback, and code.

principles.title: Continuous Learning
principles.description: We constantly adapt, improve, and grow with the community.

principles.title: Focus
principles.description: We prioritize depth and reliability over chasing trends.

whatWeDo.title: Minecraft Mods
whatWeDo.description: Creating fun, community-driven mods for Minecraft.

whatWeDo.title: Developer Tools
whatWeDo.description: Building utilities that make modding faster and easier.

whatWeDo.title: Infrastructure
whatWeDo.description: Maintaining servers and APIs that power our projects.

testimonials.name: ClassyCoder
testimonials.quote: Arctyll began as a small idea. Now it’s a community shaping Minecraft’s future together.

testimonials.name: SigmaCat
testimonials.quote: We focus on building things that last—code, community, and trust.

testimonials.name: DarkGladiator26
testimonials.quote: Every commit we push is about making the experience smoother for players.

testimonials.name: Whispering
testimonials.quote: Good design isn’t about looks. It’s about making tools people actually enjoy using.

testimonials.name: PYLzanok3
testimonials.quote: Small improvements compound into a better experience for everyone.

testimonials.name: Crimson
testimonials.quote: Our mods should feel natural in Minecraft, not forced.

testimonials.name: Siddhu Piddhu
testimonials.quote: We’re not just writing code—we’re shaping community culture.

testimonials.name: WhiteLoon
testimonials.quote: Open source is about freedom. That’s why I contribute here.
